greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of Dyck paths of length 2n with exactly 2 hills.
link: Dun Qiu and Jeffrey B. Remmel, Quadrant marked mesh patterns in 123-avoiding permutations, arXiv:1705.00164 [math.CO], 2017, p. 28.
mathematica: a[n_] := Which[n>2, Sum[(i Binomial[i+2, i] Binomial[2n-2i-4, n-2])/(n-i-2), {i, 0, (n-2)/2}], n == 2, 1, True, 0];
results.author: _Eric M. Schmidt_, Nov 01 2017
